title: Ku Klux Klan
summary: The Ku Klux Klan (/ˌkuː klʌks ˈklæn, ˌkjuː-/),[lower-alpha 2] commonly shortened to the KKK or the Klan, is an American white supremacist terrorist hate group whose primary targets are African Americans, Jews, Latinos, Asian Americans, Catholics, Native Americans[25][26] as well as immigrants, leftists, homosexuals, Muslims, and atheists.[27][28][29]
